# modm:platform:rcc: Reset and Clock Control (RCC)



## Content

```cpp
// Class
class modm::platform::Rcc;
// Struct
struct modm::platform::Rcc::flash_latency;
// Typedef
using modm::platform::ClockControl = typedef Rcc;
```
